title: Fingers crossed for Kateryna from Ukraine...
text:
Fingers crossed for Kateryna from Ukraine...
Ukraine’s Go_A are the final act rehearsing on the main stage this afternoon, and we've just heard that lead singer Kateryna isn’t taking part. Apparently she was feeling a little unwell this morning, and COVID-19 rules mean that she now has to wait for the results of a PCR test before she can return to the arena. The other members of the band have all tested negative and are rehearsing with a stand-in singer today. We have our fingers crossed for Kateryna and hope she’ll be back with us soon!
